stimulusHtml: A contractionary monetary policy by the Canadian central bank will likely affect international financial capital flows and the Canadian dollar in which of the following ways in the short run?
choicesHtml: Financial capital flows from Canada will increase, and the Canadian dollar will appreciate.
Financial capital flows from Canada will increase, and the Canadian dollar will depreciate.
Financial capital flows from Canada will increase, and the value of the Canadian dollar will not change.
Financial capital flows to Canada will increase, and the Canadian dollar will depreciate.
Financial capital flows to Canada will increase, and the Canadian dollar will appreciate.
